#summary 站点管理.
#labels free,cms,freecms,freeteam,开源,免费,内容管理系统

= 站点管理 =

<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">FreeCMS</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">支持网站群模式<span>,</span>并支持无限树级管理。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>1.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">添加一级站点</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">从左侧管理菜单点击站点管理进入。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">提示</span></b><span style="font-family: 宋体">：只有<span>admin</span>才可以进行"添加一级站点"操作。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体"><a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/192840_sqC7_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/192840_sqC7_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></span></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击"添加一级站点"</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体"><a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/192905_cVY4_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/192905_cVY4_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></span></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">输入相关属性点击"保存"即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体"><a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/192931_QdnS_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/192931_QdnS_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></span></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>2.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">添加下级站点</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击需要添加下级站点的站点，如"一级站点"</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193011_QOqt_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193011_QOqt_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击"添加下级站点"</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193040_a9xh_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193040_a9xh_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">填写相关属性后点击"保存"即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193059_gVEY_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193059_gVEY_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>3.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">改变所属站点</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">为了方便用户使用，<span>FreeCMS</span>提供了改变站点结构的简便方法，使您在想对站点结构作出调整时不需要删除重建站点。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">选择需要改变所属站点的站点，如"一级站点"</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193126_yYpM_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193126_yYpM_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击"改变所属站点"</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/201956_C6QJ_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/201956_C6QJ_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">选择需要调整的位置，如"</span><span>FreeCMS</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">"，直接点击即可。</span></p>
<p>
	 <a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193209_sObe_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193209_sObe_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">注意</span></b><span style="font-family: 宋体">：
	* 如果选择“站点管理”，则此站点会变为一级站点。
	* 在改变所属站点时，此站点的子站点不会改变。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>4.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">删除站点</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">删除站点功能将删除指定站点及子站点，此操作不可恢复，请慎重操作。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">选择需要删除的站点，如"一级站点"</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193252_E5HJ_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193252_E5HJ_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击"删除"按钮</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193316_Bss8_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193316_Bss8_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">为会防止用户误操作，系统会提示用户确认，点击"确定"按钮</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>5.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">预览站点</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击需要预览的站点，如"<span>FreeCMS</span>"</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193337_XQDz_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193337_XQDz_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击"预览站点"按钮</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193402_eiSr_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1224/193402_eiSr_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
